docs: large , comfortable , clean and fully stocked and functioning .clean , friendly staff , nice shower roomit was clean and large , and while we thought the noise from the pool might bother us , it did not .clean , adequately furnished and well maintained , we were very satisfied .i would stay here again but definitely ask them to find me a room with a better ac . </DOC> courtyard facing room very clean and spacious , 2 pools,1the bathroom area was spacious as well with lots of closet space .the furniture is n't really old , just in an older style than most hotels have now .the rooms were large , clean and modern with all the usual facilities one would expect .the full bath was very clean and had nice towels and products . </DOC> room was very clean and quiet and staff were friendly and accomodating throughout the conference with no problems encountered .it is consistently very clean .the motel rooms are clean .the room was clean and neat .plenty of space , comfy bed and pillows and a nice bathroom .
summary: the rooms are clean and comfortable , and the staff is very friendly and helpful .the room was clean and well equipped .the room was clean and comfortable and large .the room was clean , spacious and comfortable .the room was very clean and the bed was very comfortable .</DOC><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad>
